CAMPAIGN_NAME: Western Barents Sea Greenland halibut genetic diversity and heavy metals study
CAMPAIGN_COMMENT: Commercial cruise to study genetic diversity and heavy metal concentrations in Greenland halibut during spawning migration period in Western Barents Sea. Four samples collected from trawls at different depths and locations. Only two trawls analysed for metal content. Individual organism concentrations reported in paper, but summary statistics calculated in paper used here for efficiency's sake.
